d:
Hello guys!

I decided to change the way I update the comics, instead of spending a whole month rendering and then update gallery, I'll update once a week at least.

I also decided, as you already noticed, to present my comics in a way similar to a traditional comic book. I took this decision because I believe it respects more the time and attetion spam you readers deposit in my work.

So what are you thinking about the comics until now? I am a beginner and i believe there is a lot room for improvement.

So, if you want to support me, and only if you want to, you can go to: https://www.patreon.com/ChocoH4z3.
